snippet: “Big History,” a new series on H2, examines underrecognized trends, values and movements that helped to propel great events and cultures.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews television series Big History on the H2 channel.
lead_paragraph: “Big History,” a new series on H2, examines underrecognized trends, values and movements that helped to propel great events and cultures.

headline.seo: ‘Big History,’ a New Series, Debuts on H2
headline.main: Salt Licks and Other Civilization Engines
headline.print_headline: Salt Licks And Other Civilization Engines
